titleStmt.title: The safe vvay to glory, in several exercises of general use. / By William Smyth M. Ar. R. of Cotton in Suff.
titleStmt.author: Smith, William, b. 1615 or 16.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Evan Tyler, for Ed. Dod, at the signe of the Gunne, in Ivy Lane,
